Key Match Events: Davis recorded a 35-point night, leading the Lakers to a 123-116 comeback win.
Austin Reaves assisted Davis multiple times, contributing significantly to the Lakers' efforts.
Post-Match Reflections: Anthony Davis carried the Lakers for the second straight game, putting up 35 points, eight rebounds, four assists, two blocks, and one steal.
The Lakers managed to fend off Kevin Durant and the Phoenix Suns, securing their first 2-0 start to their season since 2010-11.
Miscellaneous Highlights: LeBron James facilitated a lot with eight assists and 21 points.
Rui Hachimura contributed with 14 points and seven rebounds.
